title: I've Been Scammed
itunes:title: I've Been Scammed
description:
Today on the show, our intern got on the mic and told us about an unfortunate situation about her getting scammed and the scammer emptying out her entire bank account, all because she sent money to the wrong person, so we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners  had similar situations. Moreover, Mayor Pete Buttigieg stopped and spoke about reparatio.s, elimination of the electoral college, and being an openly gay man in the election. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to a Florida couple  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
